data.event: As of the 2000 census, Huiyuan's population was reported as 20,564.

event.title: was annexed by the Manchus after 1761

data.event: Once the homeland of Dzungar Mongols, this area was annexed by the Manchus after 1761.
Huiyuan fort was built in 1762 during the reign of the Qianlong Emperor at the time of one of the rebellions of the local Muslim population.
